text: The 5th Annual Latin American Music Awards was held at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, California. It was broadcast live on Telemundo.The full list of Latin American Music Awards nominees Ozuna lead the nominations with nine nods. == Nominees and Winners == The nominations were announced on September 4, 2019.
